speaker: President.
english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0009/2008 ) by Mr Musotto, on behalf of the Committee on Budgetary Control, on protection of the Communities’ financial interests – Fight against fraud – Annual reports 2005 and 2006 [ 2006/2268(INI) ].
